```{r, message=F}
require(ggplot2)
require(dplyr)

pokemons <- read.csv("C:/Users/alili/Downloads/pokemons.csv")
```

```{r}
diamonds %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=depth, fill=cut)) + 
  geom_histogram(binwidth = .2) +
  xlim(55,70) + 
  facet_wrap(~cut)
```

```{r}
pokemons %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=type, fill=factor(type))) + 
  geom_bar() + 
  coord_flip() + 
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
pokemons %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=type, fill=factor(type))) +
  geom_bar(alpha=.5) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(y = hp)) +
  coord_flip()
```
